title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Brass Rail and Brass Feet, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Brass Rail and Brass Feet
medium: Pen and black ink, some graphite, on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right: SIDEBOARD, lower left: Brassfoot, and upper right: Brass rail; in graphite diagonally along design: no inlay
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular sideboard with rounded corners and six straight tapered legs; flat front has three drawers: two smaller ones side-by-side over one larger one; side panels decorated in patera medallions; brass rail at back of top; sketch of wine decanter and dish atop sideboard; also slight sketch of rectangle upper right corner.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Brass Rail and Brass Feet, 1900–05. Pen and black ink, some graphite, on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-15
